content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill has no fuel
- Stone furnace has no fuel

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)
- Stone furnace has no ingredients

### Inserter system at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of following entities
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter is waiting for source items

### Inserter system at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)
Consists of following entities
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)
- Burner inserter has no fuel

### Offshore pump at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Offshore pump is working

### Boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)
Consists of following entities
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Boiler has no fuel

### Steam engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of following entities
- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Steam engine is not connected

### Pipe group at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of following entities
- Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
- Pipe group is empty

- Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)
- Pipe group has full output

### Electricity group at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of following entities
- Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)
- Electricity group is not plugged into electric network

### Belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
- Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)
- Belt group is empty

### Transport belt at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of following entities
- Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt is working

### Transport belt at position(x=64.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of following entities
- Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt is working

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities have no fuel
- Ensure that entities have fuel before using them
- Burner mining drills and burners need fuel to operate

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that entities have ingredients before using them
- Stone furnaces need ingredients to operate

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that entities are connected before using them
- Steam engines need to be connected to work

### Errors when entities are not plugged into electric network
- Ensure that entities are plugged into electric network before using them
- Electricity groups need to be plugged into electric network to work

### Errors when pipe groups are empty
- Ensure that pipe groups have fluid before using them
- Pipe groups need fluid to operate

### Errors when belt groups are empty
- Ensure that belt groups have items before using them
- Belt groups need items to operate

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
